channel.title: PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.5 Is Available
item.description: Another patch for PrestaShop 8.1 is available. This release contains interesting improvements as well as a number of bug fixes. In this article, we‚Äôll lean into them because there‚Äôs plenty to write about!

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - March 2024
item.description: In our third Live Update this year, we reviewed the already implemented compatibility of PrestaShop with Symfony Framework 6.4, focusing on its impact and the backward incompatible changes it introduces.

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update March 2024
item.description: The third Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2024 will happen on Wednesday, March 13th, 2024 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - February 2024
item.description: With over 250 pull requests merged in the project repositories, February was a busy month for the PrestaShop open source project. We released the security patch, PrestaShop 8.1.4, and made significant progress on the new API. Let‚Äôs take a look at the most important changes in the codebase.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.4 Is Available
item.description: It‚Äôs been decided to release a security patch for version 8.1 of PrestaShop.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - February 2024
item.description: The project‚Äôs live update was held for the second time in 2024. Read on for a recap of the session.

item.title: PSDevCon 2023: Do you speak PrestaShop?
item.description: Do you speak PrestaShop? On November 30, Nicolas L≈ìuillet and Julie Varisellaz gave a presentation about the project‚Äôs translations at the first-ever PrestaShop Developer Conference.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - January 2024
item.description: The first Core Monthly of 2024 is here! üéâ Let‚Äôs dive into the progress we‚Äôve made together in the first month of this promising year.

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update February 2024
item.description: The second Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2024 will happen on Wednesday, February 7th, 2024 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - January 2024
item.description: The project‚Äôs live update was held the first time in 2024 and streamed live on January 17th, 2024.

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update January 2024
item.description: The first Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2024 will happen on Wednesday, January 17th, 2024 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: PSDevCon 2023: PrestaShop News - Where We Are And Where We‚Äôre Going
item.description: The PrestaShop Developer Conference happened on the 30th of November 2023. During the day, I was able to present a conference, titled ‚ÄúPrestaShop news - Where we are and where we‚Äôre going‚Äù. This blog post is a written version of the presentation that I also partially presented at the December Live Update on December 20th.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - December 2023
item.description: The project‚Äôs live update was held for the tenth time this year and streamed live on December 20th, 2023.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.3 Is Available
item.description: We are entering the new year with the release of PrestaShop 8.1.3. The latest update for PrestaShop 8.1 is now available. This version brings two security updates, addresses close to 30 known issues, and introduces various enhancements.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.8.11 Is Available
item.description: A security patch for PrestaShop 1.7 is now available.
